name: Traffic Crash Driver Highway
description:
Drive your sports car through the highway, overtake traffic, earn cash, buy new cars. Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the global leaderboards!

If you love fast cars, this is the game you've been waiting for!

As you go faster and further on the highway you will win cash and you'll be able to buy better and faster cars! Own the street buying the best super sport cars on this fast racing game!

You can overtake other cars and you will win more points and more cash!

◉ KEY FEATURES ◉

- Lots of super sports cars
- Easy to learn and drive
- Simulator car handling
- Incredible graphics
- Endless traffic game mode
- Leaderboards and achievements

◉ GAMEPLAY ◉

- Tilt or Touch to steer
- Touch gas button to accelerate
- Touch brake button to slow down

◉ TIPS ◉

- The faster you drive the more points you get
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus points and cash
- If you do overtakes fast, you can do combos and win more points

Have endless fun by downloading this awesome racing game!

Do not forget to give us a review!
